title: Blood Recruit
description: Cohen Donahue has a past riddled with secrets. Upon his acceptance into the Chicago Police Department, memories that he worked hard to forget resurface all too quickly. Cohen struggles in the face of the daily reminders, especially those involving his late father, former Sergeant of the CPD Intelligence Unit. Unbeknownst to the rookie officer, a criminal mastermind has also been waiting for his return to the city. Cohen soon finds himself in the middle of a conspiracy theory threatening to reveal shocking secrets of his past. Racing against the clock, he attempts to clear his name while protecting those most dear. Cohen must seek out the identity of his archenemy to avoid being wrongly imprisoned by the very police department he swore to serve. That, or be killed in the process.
author: Murphy Morrison
